comments:
Using build I20051214-0010.

I opened a workspace unused since last week (ie. modified with last week integration build I20051206-1200). I update all code in it using synchronize view and refresh and everything went well.

Then I wanted to update patch of modified code in this workspace. So, I selected modified projects and clicked on Team>Create patch... and got following exception in Error Log view:
An internal error occurred during: "Synchronize View: Processing label changes".
java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.synchronize.CompositeModelProvider.clearProviders(CompositeModelProvider.java:241)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.synchronize.CompositeModelProvider.recursiveClearModelObjects(CompositeModelProvider.java:236)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.synchronize.ChangeSetModelProvider.recursiveClearModelObjects(ChangeSetModelProvider.java:286)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.synchronize.AbstractSynchronizeModelProvider.clearModelObjects(AbstractSynchronizeModelProvider.java:871)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.synchronize.AbstractSynchronizeModelProvider.reset(AbstractSynchronizeModelProvider.java:313)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.synchronize.SynchronizeModelUpdateHandler.processEvent(SynchronizeModelUpdateHandler.java:247)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.core.BackgroundEventHandler.processEvents(BackgroundEventHandler.java:329)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.core.BackgroundEventHandler$1.run(BackgroundEventHandler.java:173)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

Note that:
1) There are in fact 2 identical exceptions in Error log view
2) I closed the Create patch... dialog and restart it and everything was OK
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 102111 ***
